message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate its value, but I believe I can't afford $18,000 right now. Would you consider lowering the price to $15,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $18,000 is really closer to what I'm looking for. Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a middle ground. Could we agree on $15,000?
